properties.address: Community Centre, Chandlers Ford, Eastleigh, Hampshire SO53 4ST
properties.description: Open from 31/01/2023. Come and join us for a cuppa and a snack (this could be a toasted teacake, hot cross bun, cake, chip butty etc, depending on the week and how hungry Lucy is when she goes shopping for supplies). Everyone is welcome, it's a great place to meet new friends and have a natter. Every third Tuesday of the month, there is a short interest talk in addition to the cuppa, snacks and chat.

properties.description: Our Warm Welcome Cafe at 1-2.30pm on Mondays caters for anyone. Our Afterschool Club at 3.30pm caters for families with primary school age children. Because of potential limits on numbers, we need you to book for our Warm Welcome spaces. Please email care@hopewinchester.org or phone 01962 840800.
